archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Develop Data Services
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Develop services to access, transform, and deliver data as specified, matching the interaction model selected. Tools or vendor suites are most frequently used to implement data integration solutions, such as data transformation, Master Data Management, data warehousing, etc. Using consistent tools or standard vendor suites across the organization for these various purposes can simplify operational support and lower operating costs by enabling shared support solutions.
